## Public Member Functions

### materialize() {#a1255369cb620448dff41bb28e567c98d}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Value &#42; LocalValueMaterializer::materialize (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42; V)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
This method can be implemented to generate a mapped Value on demand.

For example, if linking lazily. Returns null if the value is not materialized.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/irmover-cpp/#l00370">370</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/linker/irmover-cpp">IRMover.cpp</a>.
